text:
──This is the design sketch of the new costume.
Please check it out right away.
...Oh, it looks like a party dress, doesn't it?

Heh, quite sharp of you.
It seems to be inspired by cocktails.
It'll probably suit Natsuha really well.
Yes, I'm looking forward to it.

...I wonder what kind of bag
would go well with this dress...

...Haha, are you really thinking
about wearing it to a party?

Oh... I'm sorry.
It's a stage costume, but I just...

But it's so lovely, you see.
I can't wait to try it on...!
